title: Race of Champions DAY 1 - ROC Nations Cup
description: This is DAY 1 of /DRIVE's exclusive broadcast of the 2012 Race of Champions in Bangkok, Thailand. Join Leo Parente, Tommy Kendall, and John Hindhaugh as we bring you full coverage of this epic motorsport event. Watch our on-track action with racers such as Michael Schumacher, Sebastian Vettel, Tom Kristensen, and David Coulthard and other superstars from a myriad of racing disciplines compete head-to-head for the glory of the ROC Cup.
